remarks: Property of well-founded relation (one direction of definition using class variables).  (Contributed by NM, 17-Feb-2004.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Nov-2014.)
statement:
frc.1 $e |- B e. _V $.
frc $p |- ( ( R Fr A /\ B C_ A /\ B =/= (/) ) -> E. x e. B { y e. B | y R x } = (/) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d R x y $.
